General.Name: CCL Products (India) Limited
General.Description: CCL Products (India) Limited manufactures, trades in, and sells instant coffee and coffee related products in India. It offers spray dried coffee powder and agglomerated coffee, freeze dried coffee, freeze concentrated liquid coffee, roast and ground coffee, roasted coffee beans, and premix coffee. The company provides its products in various packs, such as jars, cans, pouches/sachets, big bags, bulk boxes, and drums under the Continental, Xtra, Speciale, Freeze Dried, Malgudi, and THIS brand names. It also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1961 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
